Hairdryer with built-in camera: A hairdryer with a built-in camera can help you keep track of your hairdrying process. You can use the camera to monitor your hair from different angles, and make sure that you are getting the right temperature and speed for your hair type. This can help you avoid over-drying or under-drying your hair, and achieve the perfect style every time.

Hairdryer with built-in humidifier: A hairdryer with a built-in humidifier can help you keep your hair hydrated and healthy. Humidifiers can help prevent dryness and breakage, which can damage your hair over time. This can be especially useful for people with curly or coarse hair, which tend to be more prone to dryness.

Hairdryer with built-in heat protectant: A hairdryer with a built-in heat protectant can help you protect your hair from heat damage. Heat protectants can help prevent split ends, breakage, and other types of damage caused by high temperatures. This can be especially useful for people who use heat styling tools frequently, such as flat irons or curling irons.

Hairdryer with built-in detangling brush: A hairdryer with a built-in detangling brush can help you detangle your hair more easily and efficiently. Detangling brushes can help prevent breakage and damage to your hair, and can also help you achieve the perfect style. This can be especially useful for people with long or thick hair, which tend to be more prone to tangles.

Hairdryer with built-in styling tools: A hairdryer with built-in styling tools, such as a flat iron or curling iron, can help you achieve the perfect style more quickly and efficiently. This can be especially useful for people who are short on time or who want to achieve a specific style quickly. This can also help you save money, as you won't need to purchase additional styling tools.
